alert.note: Alert for Ellsworth; McPherson; Saline (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 05 at 1:25AM CDT until June 05 at 2:30AM CDT by NWS Wichita
info.description: The National Weather Service in Wichita has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern McPherson County in central Kansas... Eastern Ellsworth County in central Kansas... Southwestern Saline County in central Kansas... * Until 230 AM CDT. * At 124 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Kanopolis, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Salina, Lindsborg, Marquette, Brookville, Smolan, Falun, Kanopolis Lake, Salina Airport and Kanopolis State Park. This includes Interstate 135 between Mile Markers 91 and 92. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
